definition: relating to capital letters which were kept in the top half of a compositor's type case, one of the large alphabetic characters used as the first letter in writing or printing proper names and sometimes for emphasis
details:
adjective
- relating to capital letters which were kept in the top half of a compositor's type case
= example: relating to capital letters which were kept in the top half of a compositor's type case
noun
- one of the large alphabetic characters used as the first letter in writing or printing proper names and sometimes for emphasis
= synonyms: capital, majuscule, capital letter, upper-case letter
